sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些形容词均有"严肃的"之意。
sameAnalysis.word_list: earnest, serious, grave, severe, solemn, sober
means: earnest ： 指严肃，认真，含诚恳和热情意味。
serious ： 指具有关键、严肃或严重意义的事情。
grave ： 侧重严肃和尊严，需要认真思考，含令人担忧意味。
severe ： 指面孔的严肃，法律的严厉，伤病的严重。着重严厉性，无丝毫温情。
solemn ： 指人表情或场景气氛严肃，侧重威严名印象深刻。
sober ： 侧重因控制或抑制自己的感情而表现出的庄重。

sentence.Network_en: He was left to sober up in a police cell.
sentence.Network_cn: 他被留在一间拘留室里醒酒。

sentence.Network_en: When Dad was sober he was a good father.
sentence.Network_cn: 不喝醉的时候，爸爸是一个好父亲。

sentence.Network_en: These pressures come not from unthinking lawyer-bashers, but from sober legal reformers.
sentence.Network_cn: 这些压力并非来自于那些对律师心怀不满的轻率之人，而是来自于那些头脑冷静的司法改革家。

松松：3天背完GRE难词 ... compunction n. 良心的谴责, 后悔, 悔恨 35。 sober adj. 冷静的 36。 despondent adj. 沮丧的 37。.
雅思词汇词根+联想记忆法 ... soar vi. 剧增;高飞;高涨;屹立 sober a. 未醉的;严肃的;素淡的; sociable a. 友好的,喜好交际的&nbsp.
星尘的天空 - 博客园 ... 87：merits n 优点，价值 88：sober vt 醒酒；清醒 89：bookcase n 书架，书柜.

list.abs: disappear assist answer the hardship that maintains independent status to have enough and sober knowledge originally .消协本来就应对保持独立身份的艰难有足够清醒的认识。
用英语骂人的话有哪些？_百度知道 ... 20. Make up your mind! 干脆点 21. Sober up! 清醒点 22. Don't run away! 别想溜.
百度词典搜索_解 ... 解馋[ satisfy a craving for good food] 解酲[ sleep it off;sober up] 解愁[ dispel one's distress].
生活英语手册 042... ... 我醉了。 I'm drunk. 我没醉。 I'm sober. 不要再喝，你醉了。 Don't drink any more,you're drunk.
sob 哭诉sober down 变严肃sober up 清醒

lj.lj_ly: Stay there with us until you've sobered up.
lj.lj_ls: 你就待在我们这儿，等酒醒了再走。

derivation.yuyuan_name: Middle English: from Old French sobre, from Latin sobrius

encyclopedia.content: 歌手简介 粉红佳人（Pink），是美国一位著名女歌手，她曾经为《红磨坊》、《霹雳娇娃2》等影片演唱主题曲，是一个常有着惊世装扮，性感劲酷的新世代辣妹，虽然年纪轻轻，但已被媒体赞誉为“下一个麦当娜”。自信、率真、直言不讳的Pink就是这样一个中气十足的女生。她以自己重节奏Hip-Hop舞曲风格和桀骜不驯的性格深受美国青少年喜爱。 歌词 I don't wanna be the girl who laughs the loudest 我不想成为笑得最大声的女孩 Or the

entry.def: When you are sober, you are not drunk.

example.ex: When Dad was sober he was a good father.
example.tran: 不喝醉的时候，爸爸是一个好父亲。

entry.tran: 严肃的;审慎的;头脑清醒的
entry.def: A sober person is serious and thoughtful.

example.ex: We are now far more sober and realistic...
example.tran: 我们现在清醒、现实多了。

example.ex: It was a room filled with sad, sober faces...
example.tran: 房间里坐满了人，大家都一脸的忧伤和严肃。

entry.tran: (颜色、衣服)素淡的，素净的，古板的
entry.def: Sober colours and clothes are plain and rather dull.

example.ex: He dresses in sober grey suits.
example.tran: 他总是穿素净的灰西服。

sentences.sentence: "After thinking about the potential consequences of his plan, he sobered up"

means.word_mean: 3. become sober after excessive alcohol consumption;

sentences.sentence: "Keep him in bed until he sobers up"

means.word_mean: 1. not affected by a chemical substance (especially alcohol)
2. dignified and somber in manner or character and committed to keeping promises;

sentences.sentence: "the judge was solemn as he pronounced sentence"

auth_sentence.content: I was sober, sane and a little sunburnt.
auth_sentence.res_content: I was sober, sane and a little sunburnt.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: I was sober, sane and a little sunburnt.

auth_sentence.content: Young CEOs often need help from more sober executives.
auth_sentence.res_content: Young CEOs often need help from more sober executives.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Young CEOs often need help from more sober executives.

auth_sentence.content: They were careful, sober, self-reliant individuals.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: They were careful, sober, self-reliant individuals.

Sentence.sentence: I turn to eccentric measures to try to keep my mind sober and ensure that I have time to do nothing at all (which is the only time when I can see what I should be doing the rest of the time).
Eccentric measures are needed to keep one's mind sober

means.word_mean: 没喝醉的; 头脑清醒的; 未醉的

sentences.en: The man was still sober when he went home.
sentences.cn: 那人回到家时头脑依然清醒。

sentences.en: Anyone who is not drunk is sober.
sentences.cn: 任何没有喝醉的人都头脑清醒。

means.word_mean: (人及其行为) 持重的; 冷静的

sentences.en: He is honest, sober and hard-working.
The bad news sobered us a while.
sentences.cn: 坏消息使我们冷静了一会儿。

jushi.english: The voice of our dean sobered him a little.
jushi.chinese: 主任的声音使他平静了一些。

jushi.english: Who would like to sober the children?
jushi.chinese: 谁愿意去让孩子们安静下来?

jushi.english: The bad news sobered all of us.
jushi.chinese: 那坏消息使我们严肃认真起来。
